actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the incentives for biodiesel and renewable diesel.
short_title: Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010

summary.text: Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the income tax credit for biodiesel and renewable diesel used as fuel and the excise tax credit for biodiesel fuel mixtures.

titles.title: Emergency Biodiesel Tax Incentive Extension Act of 2010
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the incentives for biodiesel and renewable diesel.
